title: Bug 13620: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space in text
SR:
The issue can be reproduced by following these steps:

1. Load a project from the repository.
2. Select a source folder.
3. Open the Properties dialog.
4. Select Java Source Attachment.
5. Click on the 'Details' button.

After performing the above steps, an informational label appears in the middle of the dialog.
